page.title: 13SUPERNATURAL 4
page.content: {The Mystery} The story takes place in Garras.The Bishop at Garras had two sons and every night he would say good night to them. Then one night they went to bed as usual when something strange happened. They heard footsteps coming up the stairs and they thought it was their father but he didn't come in to say goodnight.The next morning they asked why he did not say good night but he said that he was not at home. We heard you go up the stairs insisted the boys. It wasn't their dad so they presumed it was a ghost. Sometimes,on certain nights, footsteps are still heard walking up the stairs and the house is said to be haunted.
